## HostEventLoadAllGuests type

All guests requested by host have been loaded and connected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type HostEventLoadAllGuests = HostEvent<"loadallguests", {
    failed: Port[];
    loaded: Port[];
}>;
```
